description: Try our easy to follow Potato Bread With Tomatoes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Potato Bread With Tomatoes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cut 4 slices of the bread and lightly toast. Meanwhile, heat the oil for the topping in a skillet, add the tomatoes, and cook over high heat for 2-3 minutes, until softened. Stir in the thyme and salt flakes. Serve with the toasted bread, seasoned with black pepper.
